headline: Ball to Announce Fourth Quarter Earnings on February 4, 2025
summary: Ball Corporation (NYSE: BALL) will announce its fourth quarter 2024 earnings on Tuesday, February 4, 2025 before trading begins on the New York Stock Exchange. At 9 a.m. Mountain time on that day (11 a.m. Eastern time), Ball will hold its regular quarterly conference call on the company's results and performance.
